itemDescription: artist, wife of Joseph Dalton Hooker (1825-1874)

wikipedia_page.main:
Frances Harriet Hooker (30 April 1825 – 13 November 1874) was an English botanist.
In 1872, Hooker translated A General System of Botany, Descriptive and Analytical by Emmanuel Le Maout and Joseph Decaisne into English from the original French.
